tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ar_educational_simulations (
    model_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    model_file BYTEA NOT NULL,
    texture_id UUID,
    texture_file BYTEA,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE 3d_models (
    model_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    model_file BYTEA NOT NULL,
    model_format TEXT,
    upload_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE textures (
    texture_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    texture_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    texture_file BYTEA NOT NULL,
    texture_format TEXT,
    upload_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE simulation (
    simulation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    simulation_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    model_id UUID NOT NULL,
    texture_id UUID NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_model_id FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES 3d_models(model_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_texture_id FOREIGN KEY (texture_id) REFERENCES textures(texture_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ModelTextures (
    model_texture_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    texture_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES Models(model_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (texture_id) REFERENCES Textures(texture_id)
);
